channel.title: Protection
channel.description: Okay so I regularly play the server and I'm really getting pissed off because I keep getting griefed and have all of my items stolen because someone has xray and can find my chests that are hidden. So I'd like to suggest something. I think regular players should have more then just 1 protection available (maybe 2 or 3.) to use on 2 chests or like a chest and a door. I'd like everyone's input on this as I'm sure Moparisthebest already stated that he didn't want this to happen but I feel it's necessary.

item.title: Protection
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

Moparisthebest:

I guess what I want to know is why all of your iron wasn’t in your protected chest? The stacks of cobble, stone, and wood are pretty useless. I don’t see how you could ever have more than 1 large chest full of valuable items.

My other chests are full of stone, coal, diamond, gold, sugar cane, wheat, lapis and a ton of other stuff. What I’m getting at here is that cheating in minecraft is easy, slap on a xray texture and find everything and I don’t see a way to stop it.

You can use /bb stick 1 (NOT 2) and right click on your chest, it should show you who stole your items.

If you chest is WELL hidden, and you can prove that so, post a picture of the log showing who accessed the chest, and of how well it is hidden, which would prove they used xray. In this case, they can be banned.
